Name: Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina
Description: The Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina is one of the two entities of Bosnia and Herzegovina, known for its diverse culture, beautiful landscapes, and cities like Sarajevo and Mostar.

Name: Republika Srpska
Description: Republika Srpska is the other entity of Bosnia and Herzegovina, known for its mountainous terrain, historical towns like Banja Luka, and its predominantly Serbian population.

Name: Brcko District
Description: Brcko District is a self-governing administrative unit in Bosnia and Herzegovina, strategically located along the Sava River, with a unique political status as a neutral region between the two entities.
